name: guest-post-workflow-e2e-tests
description: End-to-end authentication and user flow tests for Guest Post Workflow application

scripts.test:all: npm run test:auth:headless && npm run test:orders:headless
scripts.dev:server: echo 'Please run npm run dev in the main application directory'
scripts.help: node -e "console.log('Available commands:'); console.log('npm run test:orders - Run order flow tests'); console.log('npm run test:orders:headless - Run order tests in headless mode'); console.log('npm run test:auth:headless - Run auth tests in headless mode'); console.log('npm run test:all - Run all tests'); console.log('npm run clean:reports - Clean test reports'); console.log('npm run setup - Install dependencies and verify environment')"

author: Guest Post Workflow Team
